answers.answer: None. I failed both my tests and was diagnosed with GD. I had no clue, I feel just fine. The diet is easy. You just watch your carbs and sugar. Also you check your blood (finger prick) everyday. I'm needle phobic and even I can do it. 95% of the time the diabetes is controlled thru diet. Don't worry. You're gonna be fine.

question: So I'm kinda scared about the diabetes test I feel like I eat a lot of sugar. And I know its so hard to do the insulin watch what you eat. Is there anyway of knowing before you go like some type of signs?
title: GD test tomorrow
